item.title: Kyiv says Russian ICBM strikes Ukraine, a claim denied by Western official
item.description: Ukraine this week launched U.S.-made missiles at targets inside Russia.

item.title: Trump transition live updates: Vance, Hegseth lobby GOP senators on Capitol Hill
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is continuing to announce his picks for top jobs inside his administration.

item.title: How Trump has infused parts of Project 2025 into his administration
item.description: Several Project 2025 authors and contributors are not just connected to President-elect Donald Trump, but also nominated for roles in his administrati...

item.title: New details of Hegseth sexual assault claim documented in police report
item.description: The report documents a police investigation that did not result in charges.

item.title: WATCH: Piano prodigy plays music for shelter pets
item.description: Zen Micheline Hung, 14, plays her keyboard every week for cats and dogs waiting for their forever home.
